data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Vukovarsko-Srijemska to exponentially multiply disciples.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Vukovarsko-Srijemska, Croatia
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 630 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Vukovarsko-Srijemska to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Jesus, defend your people in the state of Vukovarsko-Srijemska against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Jew, Croatian-speaking people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, encourage the 630 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Vukovarsko-Srijemska, Croatia to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.section_summary:
the state of Vukovarsko-Srijemska, Croatia has a population of 149,500.

We estimate Vukovarsko-Srijemska has 630 people who might know Jesus, 137,384 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 11,486 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 237 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Vukovarsko-Srijemska, Croatia.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,
